vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.13;
son of: Othniel (H6274) whose wife was Achsah (H5915);
brother of: Meonothai (H4587)(?)
§ Hathath = "fearful"
son of Othniel and grandson of Kenaz, the brother of Caleb
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈塔 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "敬畏"
俄陀聶的兒子, 基納斯的孫子(代上 4:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈塔 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "敬畏"
俄陀聂的儿子, 基纳斯的孙子(代上 4:13)
